GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted by the most recent

queries.limit: limits the number of responses - pagination

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with a single article by article_id

articles/1.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles/1.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with a all comments for an article by article_id

articles/1/comments.author: butter_bridge
articles/1/comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: add a comment for an article

articles/1/comments.limit: limits the number of responses - pagination

articles.author: news_man
articles.title: What a time to be alive

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/.description: updates an article's votes based on the number of votes provided in the input object

articles/1/.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles/1/.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment based on the comment_id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates a comment's votes based on the number of votes provided in the input object

comments/1/.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments/1/.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users object

GET /api/users/:username.description: responds with a single user by username
